title: Ticket #2932: Condor version and platfrom strings missing from binaries
description:
Condor binaries contain version and platform strings formatted such that ident will find them. This lets users and Condor processes determine the version and platform of any Condor binary by reading it. The strings look like this: 
$CondorPlatform: X86_64-DARWIN_10.8.0 $
$CondorVersion: 7.7.6 Apr 05 2012 PRE-RELEASE-UWCS $

The strings are static char arrays in the condor_utils library. With the move to dynamically linking this library, the strings are no longer present in any Condor binaries. We need to re-introduce them there.
check_ins:
2012-Apr-27 11:17   Check-in [31839]: Version history for CondorVersion and CondorPlatform restoration. #2932 (By Jaime Frey )
2012-Apr-16 16:23   Check-in [31673]: Re-add Condor version and platform strings to binaries #2932 The ident-style strings for CondorVersion and CondorPlatform disappeared from the Condor binaries when we switched to dynamically linking the Condor utility libraries. Now, they're included again. [...] (By Jaime Frey )
creator: jfrey
